verses.text_plain: Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,
verses.verse_html: 1Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,

verses.text_plain: Therefore do my thoughts cause me to answer, and for this I make haste.
verses.verse_html:
2Therefore do my thoughts cause me to answer, and for this I make haste. ▼
▼ I make…: Heb. my haste is in me

footnotes.body_text: ▼ I make…: Heb. my haste is in me
footnotes.body_html: ▼ I make…: Heb. my haste is in me

verses.text_plain: I have heard the check of my reproach, and the spirit of my understanding causeth me to answer.
verses.verse_html: 3I have heard the check of my reproach, and the spirit of my understanding causeth me to answer.

verses.text_plain: Knowest thou not this of old, since man was placed upon earth,
verses.verse_html: 4Knowest thou not this of old, since man was placed upon earth,

verses.text_plain: That the triumphing of the wicked is short, and the joy of the hypocrite but for a moment?
verses.verse_html:
5That the triumphing of the wicked is short, and the joy of the hypocrite but for a moment? ▼
▼ short: Heb. from near

footnotes.body_html: ▼ short: Heb. from near

verses.text_plain: Though his excellency mount up to the heavens, and his head reach unto the clouds;
verses.verse_html:
6Though his excellency mount up to the heavens, and his head reach unto the clouds; ▼
▼ clouds: Heb. cloud

verses.text_plain: Yet he shall perish for ever like his own dung: they which have seen him shall say, Where is he?
verses.verse_html: 7Yet he shall perish for ever like his own dung: they which have seen him shall say, Where is he?

verses.text_plain: He shall fly away as a dream, and shall not be found: yea, he shall be chased away as a vision of the night.
verses.verse_html: 8He shall fly away as a dream, and shall not be found: yea, he shall be chased away as a vision of the night.

tokens.text: yea, he shall be chased away

verses.text_plain: The eye also which saw him shall see him no more; neither shall his place any more behold him.
verses.verse_html: 9The eye also which saw him shall see him no more; neither shall his place any more behold him.

verses.text_plain: His children shall seek to please the poor, and his hands shall restore their goods.
verses.verse_html:
10His children shall seek to please the poor, and his hands shall restore their goods. ▼
▼ His children…: or, The poor shall oppress his children

footnotes.body_text: ▼ His children…: or, The poor shall oppress his children
footnotes.body_html: ▼ His children…: or, The poor shall oppress his children

verses.text_plain: His bones are full of the sin of his youth, which shall lie down with him in the dust.
verses.verse_html: 11His bones are full of the sin of his youth, which shall lie down with him in the dust.

verses.text_plain: Though wickedness be sweet in his mouth, though he hide it under his tongue;
verses.verse_html: 12Though wickedness be sweet in his mouth, though he hide it under his tongue;

verses.text_plain: Though he spare it, and forsake it not; but keep it still within his mouth:
verses.verse_html:
13Though he spare it, and forsake it not; but keep it still within his mouth: ▼
▼ within…: Heb. in the midst of his palate

tokens.text: it not; but keep it still

footnotes.body_text: ▼ within…: Heb. in the midst of his palate
footnotes.body_html: ▼ within…: Heb. in the midst of his palate

verses.text_plain: Yet his meat in his bowels is turned, it is the gall of asps within him.
verses.verse_html: 14Yet his meat in his bowels is turned, it is the gall of asps within him.

verses.text_plain: He hath swallowed down riches, and he shall vomit them up again: God shall cast them out of his belly.
verses.verse_html: 15He hath swallowed down riches, and he shall vomit them up again: God shall cast them out of his belly.

tokens.text: and he shall vomit them up again

verses.text_plain: He shall suck the poison of asps: the viper’s tongue shall slay him.
verses.verse_html: 16He shall suck the poison of asps: the viper’s tongue shall slay him.

verses.text_plain: He shall not see the rivers, the floods, the brooks of honey and butter.
verses.verse_html:
17He shall not see the rivers, the floods, the brooks of honey and butter. ▼
▼ the floods…: or, streaming brooks

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the floods…: or, streaming brooks

verses.text_plain: That which he laboured for shall he restore, and shall not swallow it down: according to his substance shall the restitution be, and he shall not rejoice therein.
verses.verse_html:
18That which he laboured for shall he restore, and shall not swallow it down: according to his substance shall the restitution be, and he shall not rejoice therein. ▼
▼ his…: Heb. the substance of his exchange

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his…: Heb. the substance of his exchange
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his…: Heb. the substance of his exchange

verses.text_plain: Because he hath oppressed and hath forsaken the poor; because he hath violently taken away an house which he builded not;
verses.verse_html:
19Because he hath oppressed and hath forsaken the poor; because he hath violently taken away an house which he builded not; ▼
▼ oppressed: Heb. crushed

verses.text_plain: Surely he shall not feel quietness in his belly, he shall not save of that which he desired.
verses.verse_html:
20Surely he shall not feel quietness in his belly, he shall not save of that which he desired. ▼
▼ feel: Heb. know

verses.text_plain: There shall none of his meat be left; therefore shall no man look for his goods.
verses.verse_html:
21There shall none of his meat be left; therefore shall no man look for his goods. ▼
▼ none…: or, be none left for his meat

tokens.text: There shall none of his meat

footnotes.body_text: ▼ none…: or, be none left for his meat
footnotes.body_html: ▼ none…: or, be none left for his meat

verses.text_plain: In the fulness of his sufficiency he shall be in straits: every hand of the wicked shall come upon him.
verses.verse_html:
22In the fulness of his sufficiency he shall be in straits: every hand of the wicked shall come upon him. ▼
▼ wicked: or, troublesome

verses.text_plain: When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.
verses.verse_html: 23When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.

tokens.text: upon him while he is eating

verses.text_plain: He shall flee from the iron weapon, and the bow of steel shall strike him through.
verses.verse_html: 24He shall flee from the iron weapon, and the bow of steel shall strike him through.

verses.text_plain: It is drawn, and cometh out of the body; yea, the glittering sword cometh out of his gall: terrors are upon him.
verses.verse_html: 25It is drawn, and cometh out of the body; yea, the glittering sword cometh out of his gall: terrors are upon him.

verses.text_plain: All darkness shall be hid in his secret places: a fire not blown shall consume him; it shall go ill with him that is left in his tabernacle.
verses.verse_html: 26All darkness shall be hid in his secret places: a fire not blown shall consume him; it shall go ill with him that is left in his tabernacle.

verses.text_plain: The heaven shall reveal his iniquity; and the earth shall rise up against him.
verses.verse_html: 27The heaven shall reveal his iniquity; and the earth shall rise up against him.

verses.text_plain: The increase of his house shall depart, and his goods shall flow away in the day of his wrath.
verses.verse_html: 28The increase of his house shall depart, and his goods shall flow away in the day of his wrath.

verses.text_plain: This is the portion of a wicked man from God, and the heritage appointed unto him by God.
verses.verse_html:
29This is the portion of a wicked man from God, and the heritage appointed unto him by God. ▼
▼ appointed…: Heb. of his decree from God

footnotes.body_text: ▼ appointed…: Heb. of his decree from God
footnotes.body_html: ▼ appointed…: Heb. of his decree from God
